thread.title: Several injured after gunman opens fire at school in northern France
thread.title_full: Several injured after gunman opens fire at school in northern France

author: Richard Hartley-Parkinson
title: Several injured after gunman opens fire at school in northern France
text:
Several people are reported to have been injured after a gunman opened fire at a school in France.
French TV said that the shooting happened in the southern town of Grasse.
They said that it happened at the Alexis de Tocqueville School, a military establishment.
This is a breaking news story and is being updated as we received more information.
